paper.title: Average performance of a greedy algorithm for the on-line minimum matching problem on Euclidean space

author.org: Department of Computer Science, National Tsing Hua University, Hsinchu 300 Taiwan, ROC
Department of Computer Science, National Tsing Hua University, Hsinchu 300 Taiwan, ROC

paper.abstract: In this paper, we consider the average performance analysis of a simple greedy algorithm for solving the on-line minimum matching problem on Euclidean space. The algorithm has been shown to be (2n âˆ’ 1)-competitive, where 2n is the total number of points in the plane. However, we show that the average matching cost incurred by the algorithm is bounded by 2.3n times the average cost of the optimal minimum matching when the number of points is large (100 points is sufficiently large in our experiment).
